#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

#define sz(x) int(x.size())
#define LL long long
#define uLL unsigned long long


int l, c, A, B, C, D;
uLL dfs(int i, int j, int n)

{
    if(n == 1) return 1;



//    cout << "N " << n << endl;

    if(i >= 1 && i <= n / 2)
    {
        if(j >= 1 && j <= n / 2) return A * dfs(i, j, n / 2);
        else return B * dfs(i, j - n / 2, n / 2);
    }
    else
    {
        if(j >= 1 && j <= n / 2) return C * dfs(i - n / 2, j, n / 2);
        else return D * dfs(i -  n / 2, j - n / 2, n / 2);
    }

}
int main()
{
//    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);

    int T ; cin >> T;
    while( T --)
    {
        cin >> A;
        cin >> A >> B >> C >> D >> l >> c;
        int n = 1;
        while(n < max(l, c)) n <<= 1;


        uLL o = dfs(l, c, n);

        cout << o << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
